headline: Solar Foods Factory Producing Solein Protein Opens in Finland
summary: Solar Foods commences production at its first commercial facility for Solein, a protein made from air and electricity.

headline: Perfect Day Announces Partnership with Nestle for Vegan Chocolate Milk
summary: Perfect Day partners with Nestle to develop and launch a new vegan chocolate milk using their animal-free whey protein.

headline: Piñatex (Ananas Anam) Partners with H&M for Sustainable Collection
summary: H&M launches collection featuring Piñatex, a leather alternative made from pineapple leaf fibers developed by Ananas Anam.

headline: MycoWorks Opens New Reishi Production Facility in South Carolina
summary: MycoWorks opens a large-scale production facility in South Carolina to produce Reishi, their fine mycelium leather alternative.

headline: Change Foods Secures $12M to Scale Precision Fermentation Cheese
summary: Change Foods raises $12M to expand its precision fermentation platform for producing animal-free cheese alternatives.

headline: Algiknit Raises Series A to Expand Algae-Based Yarn Production
summary: Algiknit secures funding to scale production of their sustainable yarn made from algae for the fashion industry.

headline: Air Protein Achieves GRAS Status for Air-Based Protein
summary: Air Protein receives Generally Recognized As Safe (GRAS) status, paving the way for commercialization of their air-based protein.
